tei:classSpec.tei:desc: This attribute class provides attribute transition.to.

tei:attDef.tei:desc: If this attribute is specified, the instruction represents a continuous transition (e.g. accel./rit. or cresc./decresc.) from an initial value to the target value given in this attribute.

tei:remarks.tei:p: The value can be purely numeric or a literal identifier and, thus, refer to a lookup in a corresponding styleDef.
